title: First Ride: Industry Nine Adds New Solix Hubs, Solix SL AR40 All-Road Wheels
content:
Asheville North Carolina-based brand brings new ultra-quick engagement hubs and new SL AR40 wheelset option.

Read the full article at First Ride: Industry Nine Adds New Solix Hubs, Solix SL AR40 All-Road Wheels on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
